actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT apple.publicidentifier,apple.firstName,apple.lastName, apple.phoneNumber,apple.email as "Candidate Email",apple.location,apple.companies,apple.educations,apple.headline,apple.summary,
apple.score, users.uid as "Scout ID",users.firstname as "Scout FirstName", users.email as "Scout Email"
FROM users
JOIN(
    SELECT people.publicidentifier,people.firstName,people.lastName, people.phoneNumber,people.locationfilter,people.email,people.location,people.companies,people.educations,people.headline,people.summary,people.score,referred_people.addedby,referred_people.addedon
    FROM referred_people
    JOIN people
    ON people.publicidentifier = referred_people.publicidentifier
    WHERE ((people.companies LIKE '%Ruby%')
        OR (people.headline LIKE '%Ruby%')
        OR (people.summary LIKE '%Ruby%'))
    AND (people.location LIKE '%India%')
    AND ((people.relevantExperience >7) AND (people.relevantExperience <12))
    ORDER BY referred_people.addedon ASC
    ) as apple
ON users.uid = apple.addedby
GROUP BY apple.publicidentifier
